home.paas: Profiling & Credit Scoring as a Service
home.transform: Transforming Underwriting Process with Big Data and Artificial Intelligence
home.desc:
Acura Labs helps financial institutions by providing access 
to alternative data for better financial decisions

point1.content: Low penetration of financial products are caused by the lack of data coverage, and we are here to help.

point2.content:
Empowering financial institutions
 to shorten approval time.

point3.content: Leveraging credit history and alternative data in an easy-to-use scoring system.

aboutUs.title: We Work with User Privacy in Mind
aboutUs.subtitle:
We respect the user privacy by having one-time-only access after the user has given their consent and 
not storing their user credentials password.

point1.content: User will be asked to connect their digital accounts & giving consent for us to access.

point2.content: Then Acura Labs will process the data and generate reports for respective partner.

point3.content: Based on the generated reports, you can use it for loan underwriting and approval decision.

point1.content: Providing access to alternative data and using machine learning algorithm to reach the underserved market.

point2.content: Developing credit scoring system with a strong foundation of credit history and alternative data to better measure the risks of your customers.

creditScoring.title: Machine Learning Techniques & Big Data for Predictive Credit Score
creditScoring.subtitle: Our credit scoring system combines the conventional credit history and alternative data to have a 360 customer’s view to accurately predict the risk profile of an incoming loan application

point1.content: User will be asked to connect their digital accounts & giving consent for us to access.

point2.content: Then Acura Labs will processes the data and generate reports for respective partner.

point3.content: Based on the generated reports, you can use it for loan underwriting and approval decision.

point1.content: Providing access to alternative data and using machine learning algorithm to reach the underserved market.

point2.content: Developing credit scoring system with a strong foundation of credit history and alternative data to better measure the risks of your customers.

alternativeData.title: Alternative Data for Better Financial Decision
alternativeData.subtitle: Our data layer engine helps financial institutions and business partners to leverage alternative data, with the user’s consent, for making credit decisions

point1.content: Balance, Income, Transaction Detail, Transfer List, Credit Card Information

point2.content: Customer Info, Transaction Details, Go-Pay History, Bank Account Registered, Go-Points

point3.content: Transaction Details, Payment Method, Shipping Address, Bank Account Registered, Rating/Review/Comment

point4.content: Flight Info, Hotel Info, Payment Method, Traveloka Pay, Points & Rewards

point5.content: Balance, Income, Transaction Detail, Transfer List, Credit Card Information

point3.content: Account Information, Payment Method, Shipping Address, etc.

point4.content: Customer Information, Transaction Details, Ride History, etc.

point5.content: Customer Information, Transaction Details, Flight & Hotel Details, etc.
